医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
晚年志愿服务与更好的执行功能和情景记忆有关根据今天在荷兰阿姆斯特丹举行的 2023 年阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议上和网上发布的研究，晚年志愿服务与更好的认知功能相关，特别是更好的执行功能和情景记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Volunteering-in-late-life-linked-with-better-executive-function-and-episodic-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Volunteering-in-late-life- Associated-with-better-executive-function-and-episodic-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58c1d460-5e6f-4ffe-b0dd-793ad12ef215 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 12:15:55 -0400 Volunteering in late life associated with better executive function and episodic memory
研究人员利用 miRNA 表达谱和人工智能创建多类癌症诊断模型癌症是世界上最具破坏性的疾病之一。到 2023 年，预计仅在美国就会出现超过 190 万新癌症病例和 609,820 人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-create-a-multiclass-cancer-diagnostic-model-using-miRNA-express-profiles-and-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-create-a-multiclass-cancer-diagnostic-model-using-miRNA-express-profiles-and-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bf0ecbb-4229-40e0-b28c-c3f258c226d4 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 12:02:07 -0400 Researchers create a multiclass cancer diagnostic model using miRNA expression profiles and AI
积极身体内容可以拓宽女性理想体重的概念社交媒体如何有助于形成更加多样化的体型和外表吸引力概念？答案是身体积极的内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Body-positive-content-can-broaden-womens-concept-of-ideal-body-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Body-positive-content-can-broaden-womens-concept-of-ideal-body-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=602537f8-30a8-45b2-9b5d-6b12edb0a7a7 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 11:54:18 -0400 Body-positive content can broaden women's concept of ideal body weight
研究检查了肉桂和桉树精油与其分离的主要化合物的抗菌特性肉桂和蓝桉的抗菌特性与其最丰富的生物活性代谢物的比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-examines-the-antibacterial-properties-of-cinnamon-and-eucalyptus-essential-oils-compared-with-their-isolated-major-compounds。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-examines-the-antibacterial-properties-of-cinnamon-and-eucalyptus-essential-oils-compared-with-their-isolated-major-compounds。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1caf96e-06c1-4f9a-ae4c-115882491915 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 11:38:00 -0400 Study examines the antibacterial properties of cinnamon and eucalyptus essential oils compared with their isolated major compounds
比较 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron BA.2.75、BQ.1、BA.4.6 与 BA.5 的严重后果风险研究人员确定了 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 亚谱系 BA.4.6、BQ.1 和 BA.2.75 相对于 BA.5 的临床严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Comparing-severe-outcome-risks-of-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-BA275-BQ1-BA46-to-BA5.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Comparing-severe-outcome-risks-of-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-BA275-BQ1-BA46-to-BA5.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96db29c3-b62d-401c-a788-b5fb81d1ee75 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 11:26:00 -0400 Comparing severe outcome risks of SARS-CoV-2 Omicron BA.2.75, BQ.1, BA.4.6 to BA.5
在职业足球生涯中重复头球是否会增加认知障碍的风险？在最近的一项研究中，一组研究人员调查了头球频率是否与退役足球运动员的认知障碍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Is-repetitive-heading-of-the-ball-during-a-professional-soccer-career-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-认知障碍.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Is-repetitive-heading-of-the-ball-during-a-professional-soccer-career-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-认知障碍.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ae71f6d-0d01-433a-9955-6ee463973f47 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 11:05:00 -0400 Is repetitive heading of the ball during a professional soccer career associated with an increased risk of cognitive impairment?
使用 MRI 预测前列腺癌骨转移类型研究人员调查了表现出骨转移的前列腺癌患者之间前列腺 MRI 结果和临床特征的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Predicting-bone-metastases-type-in​​-prostate-cancer-using-MRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Predicting-bone-metastases-type-in​​-prostate-cancer-using-MRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1752f62c-a25d-401b-860f-5ab464bde2e6 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 10:50:00 -0400 Predicting bone metastases type in prostate cancer using MRI
大流行期间实施的多模式诊室/远程医疗产前护理的效果是否与诊室产前护理类似？研究人员将大流行前和大流行期间结合办公室和远程医疗就诊的多模式产前保健模式与仅办公室模式的表现进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Did-multimodal-in-officetelemedicine-prenatal-care-implemented-during-the-pandemic-perform-similarly-to-in-office-prenatal-care。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Did-multimodal-in-officetelemedicine-prenatal-care-implemented-during-the-pandemic-perform-similarly-to-in-office-prenatal-care。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d33be67-bda5-4777-8061-e9c3b885ec74 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 10:43:00 -0400 Did multimodal in-office/telemedicine prenatal care implemented during the pandemic perform similarly to in-office prenatal care?
性别暴力的女性受害者可能改变了压力反应系统欧洲和北美 20% 至 30% 的女性受到性别暴力的影响，并且可能成为受害者持续数年甚至数十年的持续压力源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Female-victims-of-gender-based-violence-may-have-altered-stress-response-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Female-victims-of-gender-based-violence-may-have-altered-stress-response-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=039911be-597e-437b-9b50-999434a79083 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 10:23:55 -0400 Female victims of gender-based violence may have altered stress response systems
研究：许多患有轻度认知障碍的老年人仍在开车德克萨斯州南部社区的一项密歇根医学研究发现，尽管护理人员和其他人提出了担忧，但大多数患有认知障碍的老年人仍在开车。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Many-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-still-driven.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-Many-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-still-driven.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f955429-8b50-4377-bf71-c2690226f6ae Thu, 20 Jul 2023 09:31:29 -0400 Study: Many older adults with mild cognitive impairment are still driving
